TITLE: Educational Resources
DEF: One of the three main concerns of PLAAI, complementing Educational concepts and Educational practice.
TASK: The Educational Resources pattern supports the compilation and organization of all the materials, services, and infrastructure necessary for thriving instruction and learning. It enhances the learning experience by presenting a well-curated, easily accessible collection of educational resources. To ensure the pattern's efficacy, common issues such as outdated materials, poor organization, and inaccessibility need to be mitigated, keeping resources relevant, beneficial, and effective.
